author: kubleo
title: For free OK
review: This set came free in the daily mirror on the 20 march 2010, its not bad for 65p hence the 4 block rating, but it lacks in playability and building fun overall the set is worth buying the paper for if you don't ussaly buy it but if i was to buy this for over Â£1 it would not be bought by me.

author: nivracer
title: small & cool
review:
I bought this because it was cheap, small and I haven't built anything in a while. The design could have been better.

Pros

  • small
  • good basic Le Mans design

Cons

  • lots of stickers for a small set
  • studs on side (could of used a 1X4 tile)
overall if you want this set get ready to put on small stickers.
